definition[0]: a person, thing, or situation that annoys you or causes problems
example[0]: Stop making a nuisance of yourself  (=annoying other people with your behaviour)!
example[1]: It’s a nuisance having to get up that early on a Sunday morning.
example[2]: The dogs next door are a real nuisance.
example[3]: What a nuisance! I’ve forgotten my ticket.
example[4]: I hate to be a nuisance, but could you move your car to the other side of the street?
note[2]: I hate to be a nuisance .../Sorry to be a nuisance ...
definition[1]: the use of a place or property in a way that causes public annoyance
example[5]: The nightclub has been declared a public nuisance.
definition[2]: someone or something that causes public annoyance
example[6]: After a local jury found the noise was a nuisance, a judge ruled that the bell can no longer ring at night.
example[7]: movement of vehicles creating public nuisance
